wikipedia_page.main: John Harvie was a Scottish footballer who played for Falkirk, Clydebank, Johnstone and Dumbarton during the 1910s and 1920s, mainly as a wing half. He also had a short loan spell with Kilmarnock.

response: *John Harvie (1742–1807), delegate to the Continental Congress
*John Harvie (footballer), Scottish footballer for Falkirk, Clydebank, Johnstone, Dumbarton
